# Scenario 1: Networks at equilibrium

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(igraph)
library(tidygraph)
library(stringr)

library(ggplot2)
library(ggraph)
```


```{r}
# load files
files = list.files("data/output/", 
                   pattern = "Rds",#nopatho", 
                   full.names = T)
scenarios = str_extract_all(files, "scenario_(\\w+)_") |> 
  str_remove_all("scenario|_")

# use the get networks function
data_ntwk = lapply(files, get_networks, assoc_threshold = 1)
names(data_ntwk) = scenarios
```

```{r}
# save networks
save(data_ntwk, file = "data/results/data_networks.Rds")
```
